ValidationRule.description: Valid entry values for IAAP Registered BUR based on IAAP Registered SBS
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR ( AND ( RecordType.Name = 'Contractor', ISPICKVAL (IAP_Registered_SBS__c, 'IAAP Diamond Registered'), ISPICKVAL ( IAAP_Registered_BUR__c, 'IAAP Registered')), AND ( RecordType.Name = 'Contractor', ISPICKVAL (IAP_Registered_SBS__c, 'IAAP Registered'), ISPICKVAL ( IAAP_Registered_BUR__c, 'IAAP Diamond Registered')))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: If IAAP Diamond Registered value is selected for IAAP Reg. SBS, then IAAP Reg. BUR MUST have IAAP Diamond Registered or None as Values. If IAAP Registered is selected for IAAP Reg. SBS, then IAAP Reg. BUR MUST have IAAP Registered or None as values.
